~shared_lock();
}}
{{dcl end}}

Destroys the lock.

If {{c|*this}} has an associated mutex (({{lc|mutex()}} returns a non-null pointer) and has acquired ownership of it ({{lc|owns()}} returns {{c|true}}), the mutex is unlocked by calling {{lc|std::shared_mutex::unlock_shared|unlock_shared()}}.
